title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Blended Course for Enhancing Confidence in Novice Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Apply ≥80% of theoretical knowledge in patient case analyses using multimodal pedagogy and improve learning confidence
